items.sentence: Tom and some other men arrived fifteen minutes ago.
Tom asked Mary for a date, but she turned him down.
Tom asked Mary to help decorate his Christmas tree.
Tom asked me if I could help him with his homework.
Mary\'s sister borrowed her clothes without asking.
Tom doesn\'t have to answer if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom doesn\'t have to eat it if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom can speak French better than you think he does.
Tom carefully removed the letter from the envelope.
Tom and Mary walked out of the building in a hurry.
